resources.string: You should exercise Daily and maintain your shape
Hey, I am Tathagat, I have created this simple app to calculate BMI (Body Mass Index). This is just fun little project on the way of learning android app development.

Body mass index is a measure of body fat and is commonly used within the health industry to determine whether your weight is healthy. BMI applies to both adult men and women and is the calculation of body weight in relation to height. This app does it for you.
All icon is downloaded from flaticon.com. Huge thanks to icon makers, if you want to get easy life developing app visit flaticon.com.
